revision.text: Possibly: A dissertation upon the origin and structure of the Latin tongue. Containing a rational and compendious method of learning Latin: taken from the powers of the Servile letters, the uses of the Greek digamma, and the causes of the Latin tongue. By Gregory Sharpe, L.L.D. Chaplain to his late Royal Highness Frederick Prince of Wales. (London : Printed for J. Millan, Whitehall, MDCCLI. [1751]). http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/745268430
